Author: Tom
Message:
Optimize Spaces directory structure - remove unused directories

- Update manual-spaces-upload.py to only create necessary directories
- Remove temp/ and users/ directories (not used by application)
- Keep only: import/, export/, metadata/ (actually used)
- Add helpful comments explaining directory purposes
- Update documentation to reflect optimized structure

Directory Structure Before:
â”œâ”€â”€ import/     (used)
â”œâ”€â”€ export/     (used)
â”œâ”€â”€ metadata/   (used)
â”œâ”€â”€ users/      (unused)
â””â”€â”€ temp/       (unused)

Directory Structure After:
â”œâ”€â”€ import/     - Tana file imports
â”œâ”€â”€ export/     - Generated exports
â””â”€â”€ metadata/   - users.json, keytags.json

Author: Tom
Message:
Optimize Spaces directory structure - remove unused directories

- Update manual-spaces-upload.py to only create necessary directories
- Remove temp/ and users/ directories (not used by application)
- Keep only: import/, export/, metadata/ (actually used)
- Add helpful comments explaining directory purposes
- Update documentation to reflect optimized structure

Author: Tom
Message:
Initial commit: TanaChat.ai - AI-powered Tana workspace management platform

Features:
- AI chat interface for Tana workspaces
- MCP server for AI assistant integration
- REST API with JWT authentication
- React web interface
- CLI tools for workspace management
- S3 storage integration
- Import/export functionality for Tana data
- Obsidian vault export
- User management with scoped data isolation
- Comprehensive documentation and examples

Security:
- No hardcoded credentials or secrets
- Environment-based configuration
- Gitleaks integration for secret detection
- Security policy and guidelines included

License: MIT

Description: Discovered a potential authorization token provided in a curl command header, which could compromise the curl accessed resource.
Match:
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/auth/login \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"username": "your_user", "password": "your_password"}'

# Use token for authenticated requests
curl -X GET http://localhost:8000/api/tana/files \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_JWT_TOKEN"
